question: Central Institute of Medicinal and Aromatic Plants (CIMAP) has developed a new green species named "Sim Sushil", that will help to treat which of the following disease?
explanation: Central Institute of Medicinal and Aromatic Plants (CIMAP) has developed a new green species named "Sim Sushil", that will help to treat Cancer. The headquarters of CIMAP is located in Lucknow.
